full_text: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 From To Date Subject: Attachments: Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances? Thank you, Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm. Thank you. Page 1866 DOJ-OGR-00023684

text_blocks.content: Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.
